content.question: What became of Yang Quanrenâ€™s successful business?

choices.label: He sold it after many years and retired a wealthy man.
His children managed the business poorly and it finally closed.
It has remained a successful family business through five generations.
The business still exists but has been overtaken by many competitors.

content.answer: It has remained a successful family business through five generations.

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Determine the meaning of familiar and unfamiliar words.
